thread.title: Watch Hamilton's Schuyler Sisters Super Bowl 2017 Performance
thread.title_full: Watch Hamilton's Schuyler Sisters Super Bowl 2017 Performance

author: Maggie Maloney
title: Watch Hamilton's Schuyler Sisters Super Bowl 2017 Performance
text:
The Original Schuyler Sisters from 'Hamilton' Perform at Super Bowl 51 
Phillipa Soo, Renée Elise Goldsberry, and Jasmine Cephas Jones sang 'America the Beautiful.' Most Popular By Maggie Maloney Feb 5, 2017 Phillipa Soo, Renée Elise Goldsberry, and Jasmine Cephas Jones—the actress who originated the roles of Eliza, Angelica, and Peggy Schuyler in the Hamilton— performed "America the Beautiful" during the Super Bowl LI pregame show. A performance of "America the Beautiful" prior to the National Anthem has been a Super Bowl tradition since 2009 . Previous performers of the song include Blake Shelton and Miranda Lambert, Queen Latifah, and John Legend. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The ladies could hardly contain their excitement when the news of their reunion was announced. Your girls are backkkk & including women in the sequel. See U at the Super Bowl. 2017. @reneeelisegolds @Phillipasoo https://t.co/tFn4g2F04O 
— Jasmine Cephas Jones (@JasCephasJones) January 27, 2017 Most Popular
